column3:
It was Tuesday.  Tuesday was Square's favorite day.  Wednesday was nice because it was always Spaghetti Night.  Saturday was great because of the morning cartoons.  But Tuesday?  Tuesday was the day it always went to visit its friend Diamond.
ewline
ewlineIt was a beautiful day!  The spring wind was blowing, and the sun was shining.  Square and Diamond went to play by the river.  
ewline
ewlineThey were having a great time.  They swam.  They fished.  They played hide and seek.
ewline
ewlineSuddenly, the wind picked up.
ewline
ewline"Hey, Square!  Would you like to see a trick?"
ewline
ewline"Sure Diamond!  What is it?"
ewline
ewlineDiamond took a string out of its pocket.  Diamond tied it to her, and then she tied it to a tree.
ewline
ewline"Watch this!"  Diamond jumped into the wind.  Suddenly, she was flying!  She floated.  She swooped.  She played with the clouds and the birds.  She flew faster.  She flew slower.
ewline
ewlineAt first, Square was amazed.  But slowly, Square started to frown.
ewline
ewlineDiamond landed in front of her friend.  "What's wrong?"
ewline
ewline"That was amazing!  It looks like a lot of fun.  But I am not shaped like a kite.  I can't do those amazing things like you."
ewline
ewlineDiamond smiled.  "Yes you can, Square!  Stand on your tip-toes!"
ewline
ewlineSo Square did.
ewline
ewline"Now, go look at yourself in the river."
ewline
ewlineSquare walked to the river and looked down.  But he did not see a square.  He saw a diamond!
ewline
ewlineDiamond handed Square the string.  "Now jump!" she said.
ewline
ewlineSquare jumped.  He jumped as high as he could.  Just as he started to fall, the wind blew and picked him up.
ewline
ewlineHe was flying, like Diamond!
ewline
ewlineHe floated.  He swooped.  He played with the clouds and the birds.  He flew faster.  He flew slower.
ewline
ewlineHe soon landed.  The sun was setting, so they said goodbye and made plans to meet again next Tuesday.
ewline
ewlineIt was a beautiful day.
column4: multiple: What did Square see in the river?
column10: He was not a diamond, so he could not swim.
column11: He didn't have a string, so he could not fish.
column13: He was not shaped like a kite, so he could not fly.
column14: multiple: What did Square and Diamond do?
column19: one: What is Square's favorite day?
